summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Block 101, D.T. Denny's 5th Addition to North Seattle, being the alley between Terry Ave. North and Boren Ave. North from Thomas Street to Harrison Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 18679 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of installment notes.
